reviewText: If you haven't exercised in a while Leslie Sansone workouts will help you get started. I had been exercising her to a while before I bought this dvd. I wanted to change it up. I truly felt like she worked every muscle in body. You will definately feel the burn with this. I really felt it the next morning when I woke up and had a hard time walking up and down the stairs. My thighs and glutes must have a wonderful workout because I also had a hard time trying to sit on the couch...Lol. It was worth it though. I must have been a little over zealous that day but that workout was a nice change of pace to move from one segment to the next. Overall you will enjoy it.
Title: Leslie Sansone: Walk and Firm With Band

reviewText: It's been a while.  You know what I'm saying?  I fell off the exercise wagon during the early winter season, got sick, and was out of balance.  Now that the New Year is in, I'm back and ready to start afresh.  You know?Well!  While I've used "Walk & Firm" by Leslie Sansone many times before, you know as well as I that when you're muscles aren't used to squats, lunges and tricep and bicep extensions, you need some muscle training. What Leslie Sansome's exercise DVD does is --well, it gives you a WORKOUT!  And just the right amount, too.I'd say for those who are regular exercisers and who do regular muscle training exercises, this DVD will be only low-maintenance.But this DVD and its workout is good for us laggards and backsliders, and it's good to keep handy whenever you need to vary your exercise routine as well.I love this program and Leslie Sansone's clear and simple instruction.  It's a 2-mile exercise walk program with interval training.  A definite calorie burner.This is a program recommended for use two to three times a week.
Title: Leslie Sansone: Walk and Firm With Band

reviewText: I am a big fan of Leslie and have been very successful with cardio and physical fitness using her walk tapes. I really liked the "circuit training" in the first segment. Only, I hoped that it would be at least 3 miles, not 2. Now on the bonus walk, I didn't feel it should have been included in this particlar DVD because it is a beginner workout for seniors. If that weren't enough, the bonus workout ended so abruptly just before what I thought would be a cool down. I'm really perplexed on this one.
Title: Leslie Sansone: Walk and Firm With Band

reviewText: The fact that this dvd incorporates the firming, strechie band into the walking routine is great. Having the firming and walking together cuts down on time. The fact that this dvd is reasonably priced for what you get (dvd plus stretchie band) only makes it a sweeter deal. I am so thankful to Leslie for not making the stretchie band a separate purchase. There are some competitors out there who do this practice and it drives me crazy! Overall, as I said earlier, I recommend this dvd whole-heartedly. Leslie makes it easy to follow and she is the best walking coach ever. I found that she paces the walk just right and is there every step of the way with positive reinforcement and encouragement. What a treat to have this exercise guru giving you personal health coaching all in the privacy of your room. Thanks Leslie for not just filling a need in the market but making the personalized walking routine memorable. She is truly a friend and mentor not just another fad. Leslie Sansone withstands time and if you buy this dvd, you'll understand first-hand why:) Get this dvd today, you will not regret it!!! Go Leslie!
summary: Love the stretchie band, it makes the whole dvd
Title: Leslie Sansone: Walk and Firm With Band

reviewText: As always Leslie Sansone is great. She is very motivating and gives a great workout.
Title: Leslie Sansone: Walk and Firm With Band

reviewText: When I watched the preview clip of this one, I thought I couldn't get much benefit from using a Resistance band. WRONG! I can definitely feel this in my arms and legs.The band helps with balance while doing the lunges. Yes, you can lose weight using Leslie's DVD's. Advanced exercisers may not be challenged, but Begin/Inter will be. These are perfect for people who no longer want to (or can't) do high-impact, bone jarring, back straining hard core cardio. Try it!
Title: Leslie Sansone: Walk and Firm With Band
